what_was_reviewed.summary: Reviewed implementation of machine-verifiable code review closure artifact system including JSON schema, Python validation script, CI workflow gate, and comprehensive documentation

review_findings.description: Implementation correctly enforces the code_review_closure requirements from .agent file
Schema is comprehensive with all required fields validated
Validation script provides clear error messages and follows existing script patterns
CI gate follows existing gate patterns (builder-qa-gate, build-to-green-enforcement)

final_verdict.reasoning: All changes are minimal, surgical, and correctly implement the required code review closure artifact validation as specified in Issue 2. The implementation: (1) defines a minimal machine-verifiable schema, (2) validates all required fields including reviewed files, findings, and final verdict, (3) enforces validation in CI as a hard gate, (4) provides clear templates and documentation, (5) follows existing patterns in the codebase, and (6) introduces no additional ceremony beyond what is necessary for governance compliance.
